    • Constructor Detail

      • FileValidation

        public FileValidation()
        Constructor. Validates default files with: - allowed file extensions: "txt", "pdf", "doc" - allowed mime types: "text/plain", "application/msword", "application/x-pdf", "application/pdf"

      • FileValidation

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public boolean check(java.lang.String filePath,
                     java.lang.String mimeType)
        Check if file is valid. Use only the custom function if provided. Else check if the file has an allowed extension and mimetype.
        Parameters:
        filePath - File path.
        mimeType - File mimetype
        Returns:
